name: Rubric Assessments
description: The Rubric Assessments data set provides insight on how rubrics are used, the assessments they are used against, and the scoring for all individual learner assessments. Note: This data set only reports on fully assessed rubrics. For rubrics using a Text Only scoring method, there must be an Overall Score provided for the rubric to be considered fully assessed and to show in the report. Required Permission Advanced Data Sets > Can execute Rubric Assessments (Organization level) Available Filters Returned Fields

columns.name: Course Org Unit Id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the course offering.

columns.name: Course Name
columns.description: Name of the course offering.

columns.name: Course Code
columns.description: Course offering code.

columns.name: Parent Department Name
columns.description: Parent department org unit name of the course offering. This may contain multiple values.

columns.name: Parent Semester Name
columns.description: Parent semester org unit name of the course offering. This may contain multiple values.

columns.name: Parent Course Template Name
columns.description: Parent course template name of the course offering. This may contain multiple values.

columns.name: Course Section Id
columns.description: Unique identifier of the user's section within the course.

columns.name: Course Section Name
columns.description: Name of the section the user is in.

columns.name: Course Section Code
columns.description: Code of the section the user is in.

columns.name: Rubric Id
columns.description: Unique identifier of the rubric.

columns.name: Rubric Name
columns.description: Name of the rubric.

columns.name: Activity Id
columns.description: Unique identifier of the activity the rubric is associated with.

columns.name: Activity Type
columns.description: Tool type in which the activity is represented.

columns.name: Activity Name
columns.description: Name of the activity that the rubric was used for.

columns.name: User Id
columns.description: Unique identifier of the user.

columns.name: First Name
columns.description: First name of the user.

columns.name: Last Name
columns.description: Last name of the user.

columns.name: Username
columns.description: Username of the user.

columns.name: Org Defined Id
columns.description: Org defined Id of the user.

columns.name: Role Id
columns.description: Unique role identifier.

columns.name: Role Name
columns.description: Name of the role assigned to the user.

columns.name: Criterion Id
columns.description: Unique identifier of the rubric criterion.

columns.name: Criterion
columns.description: Name of the rubric criterion.

columns.name: Level
columns.description: Level that the user obtained on the criterion.

columns.name: Points
columns.description: Number of points that the user scored on the criterion.

columns.name: Overall Level Achieved
columns.description: Overall level achieved by the user on the rubric.

columns.name: Is Score Overridden
columns.description: Indicates if the score is overridden by instructor.

columns.name: Evaluation Date
columns.description: Date that the criterion was last assessed for the user.

columns.name: Assessor User Id
columns.description: Unique identifier of the user who completed the rubric assessment.

columns.name: Assessor First Name
columns.description: First name of the assessor.

columns.name: Assessor Last Name
columns.description: Last name of the assessor.

columns.name: Assessor Username
columns.description: Username of the assessor.

columns.name: Assessor Org Defined Id
columns.description: Org defined Id of the assessor.
